procedure_followed: Motion for dismissal based on limitation periods; evidence weighed partially.
result_of_case: Claims under s. 61(1)(b) for trucks dismissed
decision_reasoning: Plaintiffs' evidence suggests ongoing conduct but no clear threat or discrimination after May 28, 1991
Palings rule applied to parts sales until termination, within the limitation period
evidence_assessment: Ongoing conduct but no clear threat or discrimination after May 28, 1991
application_details: Palings rule applied to parts sales until termination
